title: (x) Baker's Ice Cream Parlour & Eatery - Billhead, Classic Caps {Yves}
content:
Can anyone ID any of the fonts here? Thank you.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [baker-icecream.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604042504/http:/typophile.com/files/baker-icecream.jpg) | 63.35 KB |
author: evan

comments.content: We’ve already got some [Billhead](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604042504/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/contributors/tomkennedy/billhead.shtml) in there…
Ooo… ‘Billhead’ is lovely. Somehow I missed that on LetterHead’s site. I’m so glad I eavesdrop on the type ID threads!
Perfect. Only one more to ID. I thought they looked like Letterhead fonts - those are lovely.

Only one more to ID.

Huh!? I thought I had them all? “Baker’s” and “& Eatery” are various styles of Billhead, and “Ice Cream Parlour” is Classic Caps.
